section.p: If you have Ebron written in the God Box on your Adventure Sheet, . If not, read on.

The cathedral is a tall, many-tiered structure of dark stone, covered in hideous gargoyles and the carven masks of demons. You are not allowed to enter, unless you are a member of the Church of Ebron.
'Go to Aku, and apply at the cathedral there, if you wish to join,' says a Soulwatch guard.
